entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 21 March 2023
